title: Vaccines and Immunization
description: Oregon Immunization Program: Immunization is the safest and most effective public health tool for preventing disease and death
sitename: Vaccines and Immunization : Oregon Health Authority
cleaned_text: An official website of the State of Oregon Learn How you know » (how to identify a Oregon.gov website) An official website of the State of Oregon » You are here: Each year during National Infant Immunization Week, the CDC Childhood Immunization Champions for each state are announced. Kathleen "Kathy" Tompkins, LPN is Oregon's recipient of the 2019 CDC Childhood Immunization Champion Award in recognition of her work to improve public health through childhood immunizations. Learn more about Kathy. A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States. A lock icon ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website.
